I'm interested in:

Videography / Video Editing

Video is a great way to engage with people. If you take a step back and think about it, people would rather watch a video than have to read a page of text. This is why video is such a powerful marketing tool and if done correctly, the initial investment in videography & video editing solutions can pay huge dividends.

If you're looking to create commercials or other viral video content, we can help you. We have the right equipment and the expertise to craft great clips, and compile them into a video masterpiece. Commercials, corporate videos, and events are our specialties.

What you get with our videography and video editing services:

  • Hi-Resolution 1080P HD video
  • Professional Sound Quality
  • Files for TV & Web
  • Script help (if needed)
  • Â and Professionalism

Our videography and video editing services start out at $75 per hour, minimum 2 hours, plus travel (in some circumstances). Contact us today to set up an appointment or learn more about our video services.
